report.title: Summary record counts by location
report.description: Lists locations with mappable boundary output and the number of records within them.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM (SELECT l.id as id, count(distinct o.id) as value FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN cache_occurrences o ON st_intersects(o.public_geom, l.boundary_geom) #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.boundary_geom IS NOT NULL AND (lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) OR l.public=true) AND (o.id IS NULL or ( o.zero_abundance='f' AND #sharing_filter# AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND quality_check('#quality#', o.record_status, o.certainty)=true) ) GROUP BY l.id) AS stats RIGHT JOIN locations l on l.id=stats.id AND l.deleted=false AND l.boundary_geom IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false WHERE l.deleted=false AND (lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) OR l.public=true)

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.
param.join: JOIN termlists_terms ttl1 ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id and ttl1.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id and ttl2.deleted=false JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id and t.deleted=false AND (t.term='#location_type_id#' or cast(ttl.id as varchar)='#location_type_id#')

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected
